result.execSummary:
The defendant Shelton M Kingcade was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1).
  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with FFF or her families.   Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with SLW or her families. Def not to coach any team with any minors on the team.

Sex Offender assessment and treatment. Sex Offender Registry Required.  Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample-on file.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

charges.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child

supervisions.notes: 9/29/16: Court orders 85 days of sentence credit.
